title: The Incredibly magic super fantastic library resource centre kit
creator_credit: Bob Saunders, Jack Hume, Geoff Simpson and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Examines the changing role of the school library as a resource centre, with special reference to the primary schools of South Australia.
